item.content:encoded:
Your Gateway to Artisanal Coffee !

Discover More
ABOUT US​

Discover the world's finest coffee beans!

At Brewed Bliss, we believe in the power of a good cup of coffee.
Our mission is to bring artisanal, small-batch coffee to coffee enthusiasts everywhere.
We source the finest beans from ethical, sustainable farms worldwide.

We're more than just a subscription service; we're a community of enthusiasts celebrating the rich stories behind every bean and sip. 
We invite you to explore, taste, and fall in love with the exquisite world of artisanal coffee through Brewed Bliss. Together, let's brew a better world!

At Brewed Bliss, our team is more than a group of individuals; we are a family united by our passion for artisanal coffee and a shared mission to enrich your coffee experience.

CEO&Founder

We Serve

It isn’t just coffee.

Our Coffee​

Taste the difference with every cup.

Read More

Subscription Plans​

Your monthly coffee adventure awaits.

Read More

Brew Guide​

Brew like a barista.

Read More

Join Our Coffee Lover’s Club to Get Exclusive Discounts.

Our Coffee Fans Speak!​

"  Their commitment to sustainability and the variety they offer is impressive. The Colombian Supremo blend was a game changer for me. Can't wait for my next surprise!  "
Mr Carlos Rivera
"  The Ethiopian Yirgacheffe they featured last month was simply sublime. I love how each cup takes me to a different corner of the world!  "
Mrs Emma Johnson​
 " The detailed descriptions and stories behind each coffee make each sip feel special. The customer service is fantastic too. The Guatemalan Antigua they sent last was an absolute delight - rich, smooth, and utterly aromatic.  "
Miss Ayesha Kapoor​

Meet Our Team

Maria Garcia

Lead Coffee Curator

Maria, our Lead Coffee Curator, has a refined palate and an extensive background in coffee tasting. She travels the world to handpick the best beans for Brewed Bliss, ensuring that each selection meets our high standards. Her expertise is not just in quality but also in sustainability, aligning our coffee choices with environmental consciousness.

Yulin Chen

Co-founder&CEO

A passionate coffee enthusiast and visionary entrepreneur, Yulin Chen founded Brewed Bliss to bring a unique coffee experience to young aficionados.
With a deep appreciation for artisanal coffee culture and a keen business acumen, Yulin leads the team with innovation and creativity, ensuring that every cup of Brewed Bliss coffee tells a story.

Alex Johnson

Head of Marketing

Alex brings a vibrant energy to Brewed Bliss, spearheading our marketing strategies.

With expertise in digital marketing and a love for storytelling, Alex connects our artisanal coffee brand with young, dynamic audiences, crafting memorable campaigns that resonate with our customers.

149 Sims Dr, Singapore 387380

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: yulin
item.content:encoded:
About
Us

At Brewed Bliss, we believe in the power of a good cup of coffee.
Our mission is to bring artisanal, small-batch coffee to coffee enthusiasts everywhere.
We source the finest beans from ethical, sustainable farms worldwide.

We're more than just a subscription service; we're a community of enthusiasts celebrating the rich stories behind every bean and sip. 
We invite you to explore, taste, and fall in love with the exquisite world of artisanal coffee through Brewed Bliss. Together, let's brew a better world!

Our Philosophy

Coffee is more than just a beverage; it’s a ritual, a moment of comfort, a celebration of craftsmanship. We meticulously source our beans from the finest small-batch farms around the world, where quality, sustainability, and ethical practices are paramount.

Our Promise

Every coffee bean has its own unique story - from the rich soils where it was cultivated to the dedicated hands that harvested it. We promise to bring you not just a bag of coffee, but an experience that awakens your senses and connects you with the diverse and vibrant cultures of its origin.

Our Products

Our curated selection changes monthly, offering a variety of tastes and experiences. Whether it's a rare single-origin coffee from the highlands of Ethiopia or a smooth, balanced blend from the hills of Colombia, we ensure that every sip takes you on a new journey.

Join Us on this Journey



As you savor your Brewed Bliss coffee, know that you are part of a larger community of coffee lovers
who appreciate the art and soul poured into every cup.
Our subscription service is more than a convenience; it’s your passport to the world of exceptional coffee.

Sustainable and Socially Responsible:


We are committed to making a positive impact. By partnering with sustainable farms,
we support environmentally friendly practices and the welfare of the farming communities. Every purchase you make contributes to a brighter future for these communities.

item.title: Coffees
item.dc:creator: yulin
item.content:encoded:
Explore Our Exquisite Coffee Selections

From the finest farms to your cup - experience the journey of each bean.

Our Coffees



Colombian Supremo

Origin: Andean Region, Colombia

Flavor Profile: Rich and full-bodied with hints of caramel and nuts.


Origin Story: Cultivated in the high altitudes of Colombia's Andean region, this coffee boasts a unique richness.
Tasting Notes: A balanced cup with a silky mouthfeel and sweet aftertaste. Ideal for those who love a smooth, comforting brew.
Sustainability Practices: Our Colombian partners focus on eco-friendly farming, ensuring the preservation of natural resources.

Our Coffees




Ethiopian Yirgacheffe

Origin: Yirgacheffe, Ethiopia

Flavor Profile: Aromatic and floral, with notes of lemon and honey.


Origin Story: Grown in the fertile soils of Yirgacheffe, this coffee is handpicked and wet-processed, ensuring high-quality and rich flavors.
Tasting Notes: Expect a light to medium body with bright acidity. Perfect for those who enjoy a fragrant, citrusy cup.
Sustainability Practices: Our farmers practice traditional, sustainable methods, preserving both the environment and the local coffee culture.

Brew Guide

Your guide to crafting the perfect cup of coffee at home.

Brewing Methods

Pour-Over

Introduction: Pour-over brewing highlights the intricate flavors of coffee, ideal for light to medium roasts.
Steps:
Heat water to 195°F - 205°F.
Place a filter in the pour-over cone; rinse with hot water.
Add medium-fine ground coffee (about 2 tablespoons per 6 oz of water).
Slowly pour hot water over the grounds, starting from the center, spiraling out, then in.
Allow the water to drip through completely.
Tips: Pre-wetting grounds allows for "blooming," enhancing flavor extraction.

French Press

Introduction: French Press brewing creates a rich, full-bodied cup.
Steps:
Heat water to boiling, then let sit for 30 seconds.
Add coarse ground coffee to the French press (1 tablespoon per 4 oz of water).
Pour hot water over the grounds, stir gently.
Steep for 4 minutes.
Slowly press the plunger down.
Tips: Avoid over-steeping to prevent bitterness.

Espresso

Introduction: Espresso is a concentrated coffee, forming the base for many drinks.
Steps:
Heat your espresso machine.
Grind coffee to a fine consistency.
Tamp the grounds evenly in the portafilter.
Brew for 25-30 seconds, aiming for about 1 oz of espresso.
Tips: Consistency in tamping and grind size is key for a balanced espresso.

item.title: Subscription
item.dc:creator: yulin
item.content:encoded:
Join the Brewed Bliss Journey

Select the perfect plan for your coffee adventure.

Explorer's Delight

Perfect for the adventurous coffee lover. Explore a world of flavors with a diverse selection of beans from different origins every month.
 
$25 per month
Each month, receive two unique coffee varieties (250g each), carefully selected to offer a diverse tasting experience.
 
Adjust your preferences or pause your subscription anytime. No long-term commitment required.

Subscribe Now

Connoisseur's Choice

Tailored for the coffee aficionado. Receive our premium, limited-edition coffees each month, sourced from exclusive farms. 
 
$40 per month
Monthly delivery of two premium coffee varieties (250g each), including rare and limited-edition batches.
Option to specify preferences (e.g., roast level, region) and easy plan modification.

Subscribe Now
